experience.title: University Tutoring
experience.text: Paid tutor for the University of Sydney's Physical Computing and Design Programming course, teaching Arduino programming and design concepts to several classes of 30 first years.

experience.title: Software Developer, CSIRO
experience.text: Hired as a casual developer at CSIRO Astronomy and Space Sciences developing and migrating legacy code.

experience.title: NCSS Tutor
experience.text: Volunteered to mentor, support, and guide high school students at a 9-day intensive cloud computing and robotics summer school.

experience.title: Zero Robotics
experience.text: Volunteered to mentor and support high school students from several schools in an international space-themed virtual robotics competition over a period of six months, involving lecturing to classes of ~30 on subjects such as Git and C.

experience.title: NCSS Challenge
experience.text: Volunteered to mentor high school students online in a 5-week Python programming competition.

projects.desc: A ReactJS site that shows an offset day/night cycle for an online game.
A Python/Bottle project made for Unihack Sydney 2017 that helps students with their assessment timetables, parsed from various university websites.
An RFID student-card based attendance-taking using Raspberry Pi Zero Ws, made for use at the University of Sydney.
